=================================================
### Flash Metallization Economic Assessment
#### Solicitation Reference Number: NRCan-500073365
#### Publication Date: June 13, 2023
#### Tender Closure Date: July 12, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

#### Overview
The Government of Canada, through Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), invites proposers to submit a proposal for an economic assessment of a steelmaking facility utilizing Flash Metallization technology. The assessment will provide a Class 5 cost estimate for a 4 MMTPY steelmaking facility and comparable facilities using conventional Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) and Blast Furnace (BF) processes.

#### Scope of Work
The proposal should include estimates of all capital and operating expenses for the Flash Metallization facility, as well as similar analyses for DRI and BF facilities of equivalent scale. The proposal will also assess the sensitivity of these facilities to changing market conditions and determine the overall competitiveness of Flash Metallization steelmaking technology.

#### Tender Requirements
* The proposal must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website.
* The proposal should include a detailed background and methodology, as well as a comprehensive report outlining the estimated costs and sensitivities of the facilities mentioned above.
* The proposal should also include a detailed schedule and budget for completion of the assessment.
* All costs associated with the assessment, including overhead and indirect costs, should be clearly itemized and justified.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The evaluation will assess the eligibility of the proposer, the technical approach, and the proposed schedule and budget.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
